name: Otaku Engine
description:
Otaku Engine is not a game development engine. This is an "experimental sandbox" that attempts to make casual image browsing more immersive and fun.





ROBOT ASSISTANT


Helps you on your creative journey.

FRAME


Make your images or videos pop out and give them that extra flair!

EXPLORE


Explore rooms made by other players (via workshop or internet URLs).

EASY LEVEL EDITOR


Quickly create and place art and architecture around you.

EXPORT AND SHARE


Showing off your creations is just one small file share away!
